title: …and you guys and dolls thought you knew about type
content:
[http://www.creativepro.com/story/feature/23163.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019150029/http:/www.creativepro.com/story/feature/23163.html "http://www.creativepro.com/story/feature/23163.html")

How to pick the perfect typeface every time.
author: Dan Weaver

comments.content: You know Nick I was a little worried when I started to read that article. I thought they would only have one choice for a text face, but to my suprise they recommended four faces. Wow, so many choices!

Is the glass half-empty, or half-full? And the half that's full, is it water, or sewage? Or is it a mix? In which case, if you know how to extract the water from the sewage, wouldn't you already know of a more convenient place to get water?

hhp

CreativePro?  
More like CreativePoo!

Formula based decision trees often bear no fruit.  
That's why we have Rotis... I know, I was there!

--------------------------------------------  
Yes, I'm old, but I'm back in style!
